com.jgaap.backend
Class CSVIO

java.lang.Object
  com.jgaap.backend.CSVIO

public class CSVIO
extends java.lang.Object

This class is the prettiest in all of jgaap. This class handles the parsing and creation of CSV files.

Author:
Michael Ryan

                        throws java.io.IOException
This method creates and writes to a csv file and releases the Vectors back to memory.

Parameters:
informationMatrix - contains the information you want in each cell and where you want the cells
fileName - name of the csv file that will be created
Throws:
java.io.IOException

printCSV

public static void printCSV(java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> csvMatrix)
This method prints the the current matrix to the terminal in a similar way to how it will appear in the csv. This is for testing purposes.

Parameters:
csvMatrix - contains the information you want in each cell and where you want the cells
